Interface Repository<ID, E extends Entity<ID>>

Type Parameters:
ID - the type of the entity identifier
E - the type of the entity, must extend Entity<ID>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFileRepository, EventFileRepository, FlockFileRepository, FriendshipFileRepository, InMemoryRepository, UserFileRepository
public interface Repository<ID, E extends Entity<ID>>
Generic repository interface for managing entities in a storage system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    add(E entity)
    Adds a new entity to the repository.
    Iterable<E>
    findAll()
    Returns all entities stored in the repository.
    E
    findById(ID id)
    Finds an entity by its identifier.
    void
    remove(E entity)
    Removes an entity from the repository.

  • Method Details

    • add

      void add(E entity)
      Adds a new entity to the repository.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to add

    • remove

      void remove(E entity)
      Removes an entity from the repository.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to remove

    • findById

      E findById(ID id)
      Finds an entity by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the entity
      Returns:
      the entity with the given ID, or null if not found

    • findAll

      Iterable<E> findAll()
      Returns all entities stored in the repository.
      Returns:
      an iterable collection of all entities
